channel.title: Tab Names [Galkons Refactored]
channel.description:
Okay, so you guys know how when you hover your mouse over a tab on RuneScape and it shows the tab name in a little box above it. Well, I created something similar but with a fixed gameframe.
[IMG]http://i1214.photobucket.com/albums/cc492/3lv3nsnip3r/Untitled.png[/img]
The thing is that it doesn't go over the sprites/interfaces, items, words, etc. How would I make it go over these?
I'll post my code for it if needed.

item.title: Tab Names [Galkons Refactored]
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

add the hover on top of the rest of the interface code (so for example

public blah interface

addhover
addhover
addhover
blah
blah
blah

just a guess never worked with interfaces lol

Read full topic
